label: corona comparison hubei
info:
# Description

This node-red flow is creating a dashboard showing the historical statistics of the corona deaths and corona confirmed cases for the selected country or province/state.

The statistics are retrieved from https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19

It also puts in the same charts the statistics for the province Hubei (China) were the outbreak began.  To make comparison easy I have scaled and shifted the chart for Hubei.

The time shift (`"hubei date shift"`) is determined by the `"lock down date"` that you can specify.  So the Hubei charts will be shifted so that the lock down date of Hubei (= 23rd of January 2020) falls together with the `"lock down date"` you have specified.

The `"hubei factor"` is the factor used to scale the Hubei deaths and Hubei confirmed cases in the charts.  The `"hubei factor"` is calculated as the ratio of the current total number of deaths for the selected country or province over the total number of deaths in Hubei at corresponding date relative to the start of lock down. 

# Usage
At startup this flow will read the statistics from a local file `covid.json`.  The very first time this local file will not exist and an error message is reported in the dashboard (this is normal).
So in that case you must retrieve the data from Github by clicking on the button `retrieve data from github`.
Note that this takes several minutes.  You will even loose your browser connection.  This is expected.  Just be patient and you will be automatically reconnected.  If everything is fine then this data is also stored in the local file.

FYI it is not the retrieving that takes a lot of time but converting the data to proper json structure that is time consuming.

Once the data is retrieved, you can select the `country`, `province/state` and `lock down date` and the charts will automatically be updated.

You can always refresh the data with the latest available data from github by clicking on the button (but as said this takes several minutes).

name: hubei and selected country confirmed cases

rules.to: (	 $country := selected_country;	 $province_state := selected_province_state;	 $dates := covid.dates;	 $hubei_timeshift_ms := hubei_timeshift_ms;	 $hubei_factor := hubei_death_factor;	 /* graph starts from (lock_down_date - 1 week) */	 $start_x := $toMillis(lock_down_date,"[M]/[D]/[Y]")-(7*24*60*60*1000);	 [{ 	 "series": [ $country & '(' & $province_state & ')','China (Hubei) - shifted and scaled'],	 "data" : [ 	    [$map(covid.locations[country_region= $country and (  ($province_state = "" and is_country = true) or (province_state = $province_state ))]	           .total_confirmed_cases,	      function($v, $i, $a) { { "x": $toMillis($dates[$i],"[M]/[D]/[Y]"), "y": $v}} )[x >= $start_x]]	      ,	    [$map(covid.locations[country_region= "China" and province_state = "Hubei"]	           .total_confirmed_cases,	      function($v, $i, $a) { { "x": $toMillis($dates[$i],"[M]/[D]/[Y]")+$hubei_timeshift_ms, "y": $v*$hubei_factor}} )[x >= $start_x]]	    ],	 "labels": [""]	 }]	)	/*	[{	"series": ["A", "B", "C"],	"data": [	    [{ "x": 1504029632890, "y": 5 },	     { "x": 1504029636001, "y": 4 },	     { "x": 1504029638656, "y": 2 }	    ],	    [{ "x": 1504029633514, "y": 6 },	     { "x": 1504029636622, "y": 7 },	     { "x": 1504029639539, "y": 6 }	    ],	    [{ "x": 1504029634400, "y": 7 },	     { "x": 1504029637959, "y": 7 },	     { "x": 1504029640317, "y": 7 }	    ]	],	"labels": [""]	}]		example input message	{	    "hubei_death_factor": 0.5,	    "hubei_timeshift_ms" : 4233600000,	    "selected_country": "Belgium",	    "selected_province_state" : "", 	    "lock_down_date" :  "1/24/2020",	    "covid": {	        "current_date": "2/1/2020",	        "dates": [	            "1/22/2020",	            "1/23/2020",	            "1/24/2020",	            "1/30/2020",	            "1/31/2020",	            "2/1/2020"	        ],	        "date2index": {	            "1/22/2020": 0,	            "1/23/2020": 1,	            "1/24/2020": 2,	            "1/31/2020": 3,	            "2/1/2020": 4	        },	        "locations": [	            {	                "is_country": false,	                "country_region": "China",	                "province_state": "Hubei",	                "latitude": 15,	                "longitude": 101,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/30/2020",	                    "1/31/2020",	                    "2/1/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    3,	                    1,	                    1,	                    1	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    3,	                    75,	                    82,	                    114	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 1,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 114,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    0,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    72,	                    7,	                    32	                ]	            },	            {	                "is_country": true,	                "country_region": "Belgium",	                "latitude": 36,	                "longitude": 138,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/24/2020",	                    "1/25/2020",	                    "3/12/2020",	                    "3/13/2020",	                    "3/14/2020",	                    "3/15/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    16,	                    19,	                    22,	                    22	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    2,	                    701,	                    773,	                    839	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 22,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 839,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    1,	                    3,	                    3,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    -1,	                    1,	                    699,	                    72,	                    66	                ]	            }	        ]	    }	}	*/

covid.locations.country_region ~> $distinct ~> $sort	/*	{	    "covid": {	        "dates": [	            "1/22/2020",	            "1/23/2020",	            "1/30/2020",	            "1/31/2020",	            "2/1/2020"	        ],	        "current_date": "2/1/2020",	        "locations": [	            {	                "is_country": false,	                "country_region": "Thailand",	                "province_state": "this is a state of thailand",	                "latitude": 15,	                "longitude": 101,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/30/2020",	                    "1/31/2020",	                    "2/1/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    1,	                    1	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    3,	                    75,	                    82,	                    114	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 1,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 114,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    0,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    72,	                    7,	                    32	                ]	            },	            {	                "is_country": true,	                "country_region": "Japan",	                "latitude": 36,	                "longitude": 138,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/24/2020",	                    "1/25/2020",	                    "3/12/2020",	                    "3/13/2020",	                    "3/14/2020",	                    "3/15/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    16,	                    19,	                    22,	                    22	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    2,	                    701,	                    773,	                    839	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 22,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 839,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    1,	                    3,	                    3,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    -1,	                    1,	                    699,	                    72,	                    66	                ]	            }	        ]	    }	}	*/
/* 1/23/2020 or "23th of January 2020" is the date Hubei went in lock down. */	$toMillis(lock_down_date,'[M]/[D]/[Y]')-$toMillis('1/23/2020','[M]/[D]/[Y]')
/* 1/23/2020 or "23th of January 2020" is the date Hubei went in lock down. */	$fromMillis($toMillis(covid.current_date,'[M]/[D]/[Y]')-hubei_timeshift_ms,'[M]/[D]/[Y]')

/* calculates the fraction of death for the selected country at last date	   compared to the deaths Hubei (China) at its lock down date = 23rd of January 2020 + (last date - country lock down date)*/	(	   $country        := selected_country; 	   $province_state := selected_province_state;	   $hubei_current_date_shifted := hubei_current_date_shifted;	   $current_total_confirmed_cases_selected_country :=covid.locations[country_region = $country and (( $province_state = "" and is_country = true) or (province_state = $province_state))]	                                                .current_total_confirmed_cases;	   $hubei_current_date_shifted_index := $lookup(covid.date2index,$hubei_current_date_shifted);	   $total_confirmed_cases_hubei_date_shifted := covid.locations[country_region = "China" and province_state = "Hubei" ]	                                            .total_confirmed_cases[$hubei_current_date_shifted_index];	   $current_total_confirmed_cases_selected_country/$total_confirmed_cases_hubei_date_shifted	)	/*	  example input	  	{	    "selected_country": "Belgium",	    "lock_down_date": "1/31/2020",	    "hubei_current_date_shifted": "1/24/2020",	    "covid": {	        "current_date": "2/1/2020",	        "dates": [	            "1/22/2020",	            "1/23/2020",	            "1/24/2020",	            "1/30/2020",	            "1/31/2020",	            "2/1/2020"	        ],	        "date2index": {	            "1/22/2020": 0,	            "1/23/2020": 1,	            "1/24/2020": 2,	            "1/31/2020": 3,	            "2/1/2020": 4	        },	        "locations": [	            {	                "is_country": false,	                "country_region": "China",	                "province_state": "Hubei",	                "latitude": 15,	                "longitude": 101,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/30/2020",	                    "1/31/2020",	                    "2/1/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    3,	                    1,	                    1,	                    1	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    3,	                    75,	                    82,	                    114	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 1,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 114,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    0,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    72,	                    7,	                    32	                ]	            },	            {	                "is_country": true,	                "country_region": "Belgium",	                "latitude": 36,	                "longitude": 138,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/24/2020",	                    "1/25/2020",	                    "3/12/2020",	                    "3/13/2020",	                    "3/14/2020",	                    "3/15/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    16,	                    19,	                    22,	                    22	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    2,	                    701,	                    773,	                    839	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 22,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 839,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    1,	                    3,	                    3,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    -1,	                    1,	                    699,	                    72,	                    66	                ]	            }	        ]	    }	}	*/

/* calculates the fraction of death for the selected country at last date	   compared to the deaths Hubei (China) at its lock down date = 23rd of January 2020 + (last date - country lock down date)*/	(	   $country        := selected_country; 	   $province_state := selected_province_state;	   $hubei_current_date_shifted := hubei_current_date_shifted;	   $current_total_death_selected_country :=covid.locations[country_region = $country and (( $province_state = "" and is_country = true) or (province_state = $province_state))]	                                                .current_total_deaths;	   $hubei_current_date_shifted_index := $lookup(covid.date2index,$hubei_current_date_shifted);	   $total_death_hubei_date_shifted := covid.locations[country_region = "China" and province_state = "Hubei" ]	                                            .total_deaths[$hubei_current_date_shifted_index];	   $current_total_death_selected_country/$total_death_hubei_date_shifted	)	/*	  example input	  	{	    "selected_country": "Belgium",	    "lock_down_date": "1/31/2020",	    "hubei_current_date_shifted": "1/24/2020",	    "covid": {	        "current_date": "2/1/2020",	        "dates": [	            "1/22/2020",	            "1/23/2020",	            "1/24/2020",	            "1/30/2020",	            "1/31/2020",	            "2/1/2020"	        ],	        "date2index": {	            "1/22/2020": 0,	            "1/23/2020": 1,	            "1/24/2020": 2,	            "1/31/2020": 3,	            "2/1/2020": 4	        },	        "locations": [	            {	                "is_country": false,	                "country_region": "China",	                "province_state": "Hubei",	                "latitude": 15,	                "longitude": 101,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/30/2020",	                    "1/31/2020",	                    "2/1/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    3,	                    1,	                    1,	                    1	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    3,	                    75,	                    82,	                    114	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 1,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 114,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    0,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    72,	                    7,	                    32	                ]	            },	            {	                "is_country": true,	                "country_region": "Belgium",	                "latitude": 36,	                "longitude": 138,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/24/2020",	                    "1/25/2020",	                    "3/12/2020",	                    "3/13/2020",	                    "3/14/2020",	                    "3/15/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    16,	                    19,	                    22,	                    22	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    2,	                    701,	                    773,	                    839	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 22,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 839,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    1,	                    3,	                    3,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    -1,	                    1,	                    699,	                    72,	                    66	                ]	            }	        ]	    }	}	*/

name: select lock down date
label: lock down date
tooltip: Date drastic measures are taken to reduce spread of virus

rules.to: covid.dates	/*	input example:		{	    "covid": {	        "dates": [	            "1/22/2020",	            "1/23/2020",	            "1/30/2020",	            "1/31/2020",	            "2/1/2020"	        ],	        "current_date": "2/1/2020",	        "locations": [	            {	                "is_country": false,	                "country_region": "Thailand",	                "province_state": "this is a state of thailand",	                "latitude": 15,	                "longitude": 101,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/30/2020",	                    "1/31/2020",	                    "2/1/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    1,	                    1	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    3,	                    75,	                    82,	                    114	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 1,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 114,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    0,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    72,	                    7,	                    32	                ]	            },	            {	                "is_country": true,	                "country_region": "Japan",	                "latitude": 36,	                "longitude": 138,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/24/2020",	                    "1/25/2020",	                    "3/12/2020",	                    "3/13/2020",	                    "3/14/2020",	                    "3/15/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    16,	                    19,	                    22,	                    22	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    2,	                    701,	                    773,	                    839	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 22,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 839,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    1,	                    3,	                    3,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    -1,	                    1,	                    699,	                    72,	                    66	                ]	            }	        ]	    }	}	*/

name: msg.options =  province/state list for selected country

rules.to: (	   $country := selected_country;	   $locations_list := covid.locations[country_region= $country ].province_state ~> $distinct ~> $sort ;	   ( $exists($locations_list) ? $locations_list : [] )	)	/*	input example:		{	    "selected_country" : "Thailand",	    "covid": {	        "dates": [	            "1/22/2020",	            "1/23/2020",	            "1/30/2020",	            "1/31/2020",	            "2/1/2020"	        ],	        "current_date": "2/1/2020",	        "locations": [	            {	                "is_country": false,	                "country_region": "Thailand",	                "province_state": "this is a state of thailand",	                "latitude": 15,	                "longitude": 101,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/30/2020",	                    "1/31/2020",	                    "2/1/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    1,	                    1	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    3,	                    75,	                    82,	                    114	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 1,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 114,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    0,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    72,	                    7,	                    32	                ]	            },	            {	                "is_country": true,	                "country_region": "Japan",	                "latitude": 36,	                "longitude": 138,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/24/2020",	                    "1/25/2020",	                    "3/12/2020",	                    "3/13/2020",	                    "3/14/2020",	                    "3/15/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    16,	                    19,	                    22,	                    22	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    2,	                    701,	                    773,	                    839	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 22,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 839,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    1,	                    3,	                    3,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    -1,	                    1,	                    699,	                    72,	                    66	                ]	            }	        ]	    }	}	*/

(	 $country := selected_country;	 $province_state := selected_province_state;	 $dates := covid.dates;	 $hubei_timeshift_ms := hubei_timeshift_ms;	 $hubei_factor := hubei_death_factor;	  /* graph starts from (lock_down_date - 1 week) */	 $start_x := $toMillis(lock_down_date,"[M]/[D]/[Y]")-(7*24*60*60*1000);	 [{ 	 "series": [ $country & '(' & $province_state & ')','China (Hubei) - shifted and scaled'],	 "data" : [ 	    [$map(covid.locations[country_region= $country and (  ($province_state = "" and is_country = true) or (province_state = $province_state ))]	           .total_deaths,	      function($v, $i, $a) { { "x": $toMillis($dates[$i],"[M]/[D]/[Y]"), "y": $v}} )[x >= $start_x]]	      ,	    [$map(covid.locations[country_region= "China" and province_state = "Hubei"]	           .total_deaths,	      function($v, $i, $a) { { "x": $toMillis($dates[$i],"[M]/[D]/[Y]")+$hubei_timeshift_ms, "y": $v*$hubei_factor}} )[x >= $start_x]]	    ],	 "labels": [""]	 }]	)	/*	[{	"series": ["A", "B", "C"],	"data": [	    [{ "x": 1504029632890, "y": 5 },	     { "x": 1504029636001, "y": 4 },	     { "x": 1504029638656, "y": 2 }	    ],	    [{ "x": 1504029633514, "y": 6 },	     { "x": 1504029636622, "y": 7 },	     { "x": 1504029639539, "y": 6 }	    ],	    [{ "x": 1504029634400, "y": 7 },	     { "x": 1504029637959, "y": 7 },	     { "x": 1504029640317, "y": 7 }	    ]	],	"labels": [""]	}]		example input message	{	    "hubei_death_factor": 0.5,	    "hubei_timeshift_ms" : 4233600000,	    "selected_country": "Belgium",	    "selected_province_state" : "", 	    "lock_down_date" :  "1/24/2020",	    "covid": {	        "current_date": "2/1/2020",	        "dates": [	            "1/22/2020",	            "1/23/2020",	            "1/24/2020",	            "1/30/2020",	            "1/31/2020",	            "2/1/2020"	        ],	        "date2index": {	            "1/22/2020": 0,	            "1/23/2020": 1,	            "1/24/2020": 2,	            "1/31/2020": 3,	            "2/1/2020": 4	        },	        "locations": [	            {	                "is_country": false,	                "country_region": "China",	                "province_state": "Hubei",	                "latitude": 15,	                "longitude": 101,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/30/2020",	                    "1/31/2020",	                    "2/1/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    3,	                    1,	                    1,	                    1	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    3,	                    75,	                    82,	                    114	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 1,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 114,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    1,	                    0,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    72,	                    7,	                    32	                ]	            },	            {	                "is_country": true,	                "country_region": "Belgium",	                "latitude": 36,	                "longitude": 138,	                "dates": [	                    "1/22/2020",	                    "1/23/2020",	                    "1/24/2020",	                    "1/25/2020",	                    "3/12/2020",	                    "3/13/2020",	                    "3/14/2020",	                    "3/15/2020"	                ],	                "total_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    16,	                    19,	                    22,	                    22	                ],	                "total_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    1,	                    2,	                    701,	                    773,	                    839	                ],	                "current_total_deaths": 22,	                "current_total_confirmed_cases": 839,	                "new_deaths": [	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    0,	                    15,	                    1,	                    3,	                    3,	                    0	                ],	                "new_confirmed_cases": [	                    2,	                    -1,	                    1,	                    699,	                    72,	                    66	                ]	            }	        ]	    }	}	*/

(	    $confirmed_cases := confirmed_cases;	    covid ~> | locations | { "total_confirmed_cases" : 	              ($country_region := country_region; $province_state := province_state; $is_country := is_country;	               $confirmed_cases[($country_region=$.country_region) and (($is_country=true) or ($province_state=$.province_state))])	                .confirmed_cases}|	)	/*	  example input "province_state" : "this is a state of thailand",	        "latitude": 15,	        "longitude": 101,	        "dates": [	          "1/22/2020",	          "1/23/2020",	          "1/30/2020", (	    covid ~> | locations | { 	        "current_total_deaths":  total_deaths[$count(total_deaths)-1],	        "current_total_confirmed_cases": total_confirmed_cases[$count(total_confirmed_cases)-1],	        "new_deaths" : $map(total_deaths, function($v, $i, $a) {total_deaths[$i]-($i=0 ? 0 : total_deaths[$i-1])}),	        "new_confirmed_cases" : $map(total_confirmed_cases,function($v, $i, (	 $country := selected_country;	 $province_state := selected_province_state;	 $dates := covid.dates;	 $hubei_timeshift_ms := hubei_timeshift_ms;	 $hubei_factor := hubei_death_factor;	 /* graph starts from (lock_down_date - 1 week) */	 $start_x := $toMillis(lock_down_date,"[M]/[D]/[Y]")-(7*24*60*60*1000);	 [{ 	 "series": [ $country & '(' & $province_state & ')','China (Hubei) - shifted and scaled'],	 "data" : [ 	    [$map(covid.locations[country_region= $country and (  ($province_state = "" and is_country = true) or (province_state = $province_state ))]	           .new_confirmed_cases,	      function($v, $i, $a) { { "x": $toMillis($dates[$i],"[M]/[D]/[Y]"), "y": $v}} )[x >= $start_x]]	      ,	    [$map(covid.locations[country_region= "China" and province_state = "Hubei"] label: retrieve data from github
tooltip: This will retrieve the historical data from the internet (github) and convert it for charting.  This will take several minutes !

rules.to: 5. converting csv to array ... this will take several minutes and you will loose Connection ... please be very patient you will be reconnected once the data is processed !!
11. data successfully retrieved and stored in file
last data retrieved from github successfully read from local file
